Faculty: คณะแพทยศาสตร์
Major: แพทยศาสตรบัณฑิต (นานาชาติ)
WhyApply: Faculty of Medicine, KMITL is 6-year advanced professional and research-based bachelor program. We providing a robust curriculum including all English core, transformative learning, system approach and heavy emphasis on cutting edge research initiatives, we aim beyond the conventional to develop sustainable medical breakthroughs.
